title: Ep. 116 - It's Time To Buy Gold Stocks
itunes:title: It's Time To Buy Gold Stocks
description: Matt Badiali, editor of the S&A Resource Report, says gold stocks will run higher over the next 12 months. He gives us three gold picks with huge upside potential. Frank also takes your questions about Dendreon, trading options and Facebook's lofty valuation.
content:encoded: Matt Badiali, editor of the S&A Resource Report, says gold stocks will run higher over the next 12 months. He gives us three gold picks with huge upside potential. Frank also takes your questions about Dendreon, trading options and Facebook's lofty valuation.
